title: Beaumont, Texas
summary: Beaumont is a city in and the county seat of Jefferson County, Texas, in the United States,[6] within the Beaumont–Port Arthur Metropolitan Statistical Area. Located in Southeast Texas on the Neches River about 85 miles (137 km) east of Houston (city center to city center), Beaumont had a population of 118,296 at the time of the 2010 census,[2] making it the 30th most populous city in the state of Texas.
